title: Community Garden for Eastside Food Desert
description: Establish a community garden to provide fresh produce and run free gardening workshops for local families in an underserved neighborhood.

title: After-School STEM Kits for Girls
description: Fund 50 hands-on STEM kits and a part-time instructor to run weekly classes for middle-school girls to encourage STEM careers.

title: Mobile Clinic Supplies for Rural Health
description: Purchase vaccines, diagnostic supplies, and first-aid kits for a volunteer mobile clinic serving remote villages on monthly outreach trips.

title: Neighborhood Mural Project
description: Hire local artists and purchase materials to paint a large mural celebrating neighborhood history and youth creativity.

title: Shelter Animal Rehabilitation and Outreach
description: Fund medical care, vaccinations, and adoption outreach for an overcapacity animal shelter, plus spay/neuter drives.

title: Buy me a PS5

description: Raising funds to create explicit adult content and pay for hosting and promotion.

title: Community Repair & Tool Library (stock photos)

description: Raising money for urgent newborn medical needs; hospital bills are high but details forthcoming.

title: Art Title Misleading: 'Trip to Paris' Actually Art Residency
description: Funding a three-month art residency to create community workshops and exhibitions; title references travel but funds are for residency expenses and workshops.

description: we want to teach kids code. need laptops teachers venue. pls help.

title: Weekend Woodworking Workshop (stock photo)
description: Run low-cost woodworking workshops teaching basic carpentry skills to unemployed youth; photos currently stock but instructors are local tradespeople.
verification_notes: Approved; advise replacing stock photos with local proof.

title: Charity That Sounds Like Nonprofit but Is For-Profit
description: Raise funds for 'charity' events; unclear legal structure, no documents provided and benefit distribution is not specified.

title: Artist Residency Micro-Grants
description: Provide stipends and materials for six emerging local artists during a three-month residency with public showcases.

description: Community fridge for food sharing. Community fridge for food sharing. Community fridge for food sharing.

title: Riverbank Native Plant Restoration
description: Restore native plants along the riverbank to reduce erosion, improve habitat, and run volunteer planting days with schools.
